about_the_game:
The Astronomer has bent spacetime and peered deep into the future. Now, Queen Rosomon has commissioned Fahrul's top blacksmith to faithfully recreate his visions...

Celebrate the forthcoming release of action-shooter RPG The Ascent with this free Cyclops Armor, a brand new cosmetic armor set available now in the Lore Store.
detailed_description:
The Astronomer has bent spacetime and peered deep into the future. Now, Queen Rosomon has commissioned Fahrul's top blacksmith to faithfully recreate his visions...

Celebrate the forthcoming release of action-shooter RPG The Ascent with this free Cyclops Armor, a brand new cosmetic armor set available now in the Lore Store.
legal_notice: For The King & © IronOak Games. Licensed by Curve Digital Publishing Limited.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 (x64) or Mint 18.3 (Cinnamon) (x64) or Ubuntu 16.04 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10 (x64) or Mint 18.3 (Cinnamon) (x64) or Ubuntu 16.04 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2* 2900) / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2520M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: For The King: Cyclops Armor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2* 2900) / AMD FX-6100 (6 * 3300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Celebrate the forthcoming release of action-shooter RPG The Ascent with this free Cyclops Armor, a brand new cosmetic armor set available now in the Lore Store.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Japanese, Korean
